about_the_game:
The Snowboard Game is a realistic skill based snowboard game with natural physics set in multiple immersive mountain locations and snow parks.

You can do many things in the game, ranging from performing epic stunts in the backcountry or just hanging around in the park!

Create your own snowboard career in story mode where you meet other enthusiasts and pro boarders that will challenge you to learn new tricks, or get down the mountain in a new way. Complete missions and compete in tour events to earn money to buy equipment.

Tours
These events will earn you money. They will also keep track of your highscores.

Sessions
If you find a spot you like you can create a session spawn point and place jumps to get further variation on each level.

Mountains
Right now there are five fictional handcrafted mountains in three different mountain areas. Each mountain has a few story missions that will progress the story and unlock new locations.

The focus of development has been to create natural and immersive physics while still being fun with tight and responsive controls.
